summary:
19. Reaffirms previous resolutions on women, peace, and security, and protection of civilians in armed conflict, stressing the responsibility of all parties to protect civilians in Somalia.

20. Supports ongoing relief efforts in Somalia, calls on parties to ensure the safety and security of AMISOM and humanitarian personnel, and grant access for humanitarian assistance.

21. Reaffirms previous resolution on children and armed conflict, recalling conclusions of the Security Council Working Group on Children in Armed Conflict pertaining to Somalia.

22. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
